note: Shown is the 'period life expectancy' for females at age 80. This is the expected age at death, if age-specific mortality rates in the current year were to stay the same throughout its life.
subtitle: Period life expectancy for female individuals who have reached age 80. Estimates are expressed as the expected age at death, not as years left to live. Projections from 2024 onwards are based on the UN's high scenario.
